duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item specific training.
Managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring and performing post-project work and data analysis.
Applying science expertise throughout multiple parts of the item development and scoring process, including meetings with clients and educators.
Communicating clearly to a variety of roles daily, including in-person and virtual interactions with customers and educators.
Training and mentoring Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in the expectations of their roles and how to perform those duties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
